cast.name: Mutated Pig's Footprint Cast
cast.description: A plaster cast of an unusual pig footprint.
cast.effect: Triggers dialogue with scientist to propel plot.

torchlight.name: UV Torchlight
torchlight.description: A torchlight that emits ultraviolet light.
torchlight.effect: Reveals hidden messages and mutant pig tracks.

cell.name: Power Cell
cell.description: A peculiar energy source with glowing blue energy.
cell.effect: Powers up resistance's devices for research and planning.

communicator.name: Resistance Communicator
communicator.description: A handheld device for communicating with the resistance base.
communicator.effect: Maintains contact with base and intercepts pig mutant communications when upgraded.

sample.name: Mutagen Sample
sample.description: A glowing substance collected from the reactor site.
sample.effect: Provides proof of the power source and aids in devising sabotage plan.

blueprints.name: Reactor Blueprints
blueprints.description: Detailed schematics of the reactor's layout and weaknesses.
blueprints.effect: Provides crucial information for infiltrating and sabotaging the reactor.

cutter.name: Plasma Cutter
cutter.description: A powerful tool that can cut through doors or fences.
cutter.effect: Provides access to new areas and can be used as a makeshift weapon.

shield.name: Laser Shield
shield.description: A high-tech device that absorbs energy from laser attacks.
shield.effect: Protects player from harm during the final showdown.

message.name: Coded Message
message.description: A cryptic message hinting at the location and weaknesses of the stronghold.
message.effect: Must be deciphered back at the resistance base.

crown.name: Mutant King's Crown
crown.description: The crown of the defeated Pig Mutant King.
crown.effect: Symbolizes player's victory and can be put on display during the epilogue.
